author: brj
msg: - IRemovalAwareCollection, RemovalAwareVector and RemovalAwareList no longer exist
- moved handling of deleted objects in TrackingCollection to PersistenceBrokerImpl

author: brj
msg: Identity- and InCriteria are converted to a list of Criterions when the query is preprocessed.
both classes extend Criteria and thus need no special treatment during sql-generation.
